results.title: Breakfast in Paris
results.brief_description: A high-powered female fashion executive meets a handsome, carefree photographer and their relationship starts with hot glares and cold shoulders. Things don’t get much better for him until the romance of Paris catches up with her. Filmed on location in Paris. Stars Barbara Parkins, Rod Mullinar and Jack Lenoir.

results.title: Slate, Wyn and Me
results.creator_credit: Don McLennan, Tom Burstall and Ukiyo Films
results.brief_description: Having robbed a bank and killed a policeman, two brothers kidnap a girl who witnessed it all. Based on the novel, ” Slate and me and Blanche McBride” by Georgia Savage. Stars Sigrid Thornton, Simon Burke and Martin Sacks.

results.title: Sky Pirates
results.creator_credit: Colin Eggleston, Michael Hirsh, John Lamond and John Lamond Motion Pictures Production
results.brief_description: Set during World War II, this film is about a plane crashing into the Pacific Ocean and the survivors finding themselves in a time warp. Stars John Hargreaves, Meredith Phillips and Max Phipps.

results.title: Fortress
results.creator_credit: Arch Nicholson, Raymond Menmuir and Crawford Productions
results.brief_description: Based on the novel by Gabrielle Lord. A teacher and her class of nine students are kidnapped by four masked men and held for ransom. The victims plot to escape by outwitting their captors.

results.title: As time goes by
results.creator_credit: Barry Peak, Chris Kiely and Valhalla
results.brief_description: Science fiction comedy about a bizarre encounter between a knockabout surfer and an alien, set in the Australian outback. The alien enlists the surfer’s aid in finding the power capsule for his spaceship which is disguised as a 1940’s diner. However, there are others with sinister plans in search of the diner and the surfer finds he must change the course of time. Cast includes Bruno Lawrence, Nique Needles, Ray Barrett and Max Gillies.

results.title: The Return of Captain Invincible
results.creator_credit: Philippe Mora, Willarra and Seven Keys
results.brief_description: Captain Invincible was once the world’s greatest super-hero before he was falsely accused of treason and dishonourably discharged from active service 30 years ago. The United States President calls on his childhood hero, now aging and an alcoholic, to save the world from the evil Mr Midnight. Stars Alan Arkin, Christopher Lee with Kate Fitzpatrick, Bill Hunter and Graham Kennedy.

results.title: Wills and Burke: The Untold Story
results.creator_credit: Bob Weis, Margot McDonald and Stony Desert
results.brief_description: Comic recreation of explorers Burke & Wills and their ill-fated expedition to cross Australia in 1860. Setting out with 28 camels and 4 camel drivers, they were two-thirds through the journey when the expedition was completely without food and almost out of tea. Public enthusiasm remained high for Burke & Wills and the expedition from which they did not return. Starring Gary McDonald and Kim Gyngell.

results.title: Eliza Fraser
results.brief_description: A 19th Century seafarer and his wife journey to Australia, where the crew mutinies, and they are captured by Aborigines. The seafarer is killed and his wife has many adventures before returning home. Stars Susannah York, Trevor Howard, Noel Ferrier and John Waters.
